Name: Blocky Snake
About the game: Guide a snake to eat fruits and be the longest snake ever! Unlock skins, collect unique items, avoid other snakes and challenge your friends for the highest score! - Free to play - No internet connection required - Perfect to play while waiting for other games - Improve your highscore in endless mode
